name: Proletarian
description:
Proletarian is a colony-sim game with RTS elements with fully desctructible voxel world, where you should develop a colony, explore the world and defend yourself against enemies.

[WARNING] It is an early prototype of the game. You may experience bugs and performance drops while playing.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move camera around
  • Arrows up / down - Move camera up and down
  • Central mouse button - Rotate camera
  • Right mouse button - Move units to the point
  • Left mouse button - Select units or buildings, send order.
  • U - Show / hide units panel
  • L - Show / hide inventory panel
  • Backspace - Remove selection of units
  • Backslash - Show / hide orders panel

How to play:

Use the bottom panels to send orders to units. Gather resources using the "Stone axe" button.

First off, place a "Storage" building, gather some wood, and build a workbench to craft items. Use the research station to unlock new buildings.

Craft weapons iin the workbench and other buildings. Arm your units with weapons from the storage using the "Sword and Hammer" button. The "Shield" button is to stand ground, the "Sword" button is to fight the way to the point.

Your goal is to develop a colony and build an airship.
